description.@en: Though you might try to deny it for your own peace of mind, I feel a divine connection to something otherworldly.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: When you hold an amulet and Risk Backlash, you must roll two or more face ‘6s’ on Chaos Dice to trigger it. Randomly determine three Common Spells you learn as free Unique Abilities from the Common Spells Listings table. Finally, you can Risk Backlash and Unfetter your Spells (covered in Article 7: Combat Encounters and Article 9: Hexenmeister’s Almanack).
